description: Calabria was not hit by the first wave of the pandemic but its fragile health system is buckling now.
title: Italy's Calabria has two pandemics: Covid and the mafia
title_page: Italy's Calabria has two pandemics: Covid and the mafia - BBC News
maintext: "The second wave has hit us much harder than the first," he says, as he guides us between beds of patients on assisted breathing. "We are lacking staff - and the limited ones we have are doing several extra shifts." One of the female patients is conscious, in a ventilation helmet. She manages a brief wave of her hand: a small gesture to lift the spirits of the exhausted doctors.
